_xResult.title: Ring on Me Swing Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made mini dress with high neck
_xResult.longdesc:
Be a modern-day princess in this made to measure mini dress fit for a queen. The fabulous fabric, reminiscent of the vintage lurex disco textile, is glittery and silvery in every sense of the words. The flattering A-line silhouette is perfect for all shapes and sizes. The velvet, high neck collar is the centerpiece of this look, which can be detached easily depending on your mood.


You need a dress made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
